channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Roo Irvine discovers an extraordinary collection of miniature outfits that traces the changes in fashion over the last 1,000 years. At the Grosvenor Museum in Chester, Roo meets former costume designer Lisa Jayne Smith, who has dressed more than 100 dolls in elaborate period costume. At the fair in Oswestry, the teams are hoping they're dressed for success. The reds are guided by Danny Sebastian. They're up against Colin Young and the blues.
